Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~binhn what is this? If we need to close an item with no action, mark version WONTFIX and then change status to DONE.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: Ok, I am going to mark as DONE all items linked because OMG what a mess.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: someone should review the list of linked items to confirm that they are indeed WONTFIX, then we should mark THIS as DONE.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: closing this since there was no feedback
